entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Prince Rupert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Rupert Airport 3:43 PM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.1°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
